scripts.sprite: svg2sprite ./src/assets/dynamic-icons ./src/assets/sprites/sprite.svg --stripAttrs width --stripAttrs height --stripAttrs fill --stripAttrs stroke --stripAttrs id
scripts.publish typography: ng build typography --configuration production && cd dist/typography && npm publish --access public
scripts.publish cdk: ng build cdk --configuration production && cd dist/cdk && npm publish
scripts.publish lists: ng build lists --configuration production && cd dist/lists && npm publish --access public
scripts.publish layout: ng build layout --configuration production && cd dist/layout && npm publish
scripts.publish pagination: ng build pagination --configuration production && cd dist/pagination && npm publish --access public
scripts.publish controls: ng build controls --configuration production && cd dist/controls && npm publish
scripts.publish direction: ng build direction --configuration production && cd dist/direction && npm publish
scripts.publish icon: ng build icon --configuration production && cd dist/icon && npm publish --access=public
scripts.publish button: ng build button --configuration production && cd dist/button && npm publish --access=public
scripts.publish tabs: ng build tabs --configuration production && cd dist/tabs && npm publish --access=public
